## Production Reference Repositories

### Vercel Examples
- AI Chatbot: https://github.com/vercel/ai-chatbot

### Community Projects
- shadcn UI Examples: https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/tree/main/apps/www/app

## Reference Patterns
- Follow Vercel AI SDK patterns for agentic workflows
- Use shadcn/ui components as base, enhance with Framer Motion
- Reference Midday and Vercel design patterns for UI inspiration
- Follow Next.js App Router best practices for routing and data fetching
- Use Vercel AI Gateway for multi-provider routing
- Implement Streamdown for perfect markdown streaming
- Use Midday AI SDK Tools for state management and utilities

## Enterprise Standards
- SOC 2 Type II compliance readiness
- Server-side security patterns
- Enterprise-grade error handling
- Production deployment best practices
- Data security and encryption
- React Taint API for sensitive data

## Corporate Context
**Organization**: Hexus Global Holdings, Inc.  
**Divisions**: Hexus Labs, Theia AI Systems, Cerberus Security, Vyricon Capital  
**Focus**: Enterprise-only solutions with institutional-grade quality
